content: generate an ui to display this list of restaurant, the user must be able to search and filter by location, price etc. restaurants: [{"name":"La Bella Italia","address":"123 Main Street, Downtown","location":{"city":"New York","country":"USA"},"food_types":["Italian","Mediterranean"],"pricy_score":7},{"name":"Sushi Paradise","address":"456 Ocean Avenue, Waterfront","location":{"city":"San Francisco","country":"USA"},"food_types":["Japanese","Sushi","Asian"],"pricy_score":8},{"name":"Burger Junction","address":"789 Park Lane, Midtown","location":{"city":"Chicago","country":"USA"},"food_types":["American","Burgers","Fast Food"],"pricy_score":4},{"name":"Le Jardin","address":"321 Rose Boulevard, Uptown","location":{"city":"Paris","country":"France"},"food_types":["French","Fine Dining"],"pricy_score":9},{"name":"Spice Garden","address":"654 Market Street, Downtown","location":{"city":"London","country":"UK"},"food_types":["Indian","Vegetarian","Asian"],"pricy_score":5},{"name":"Taco Fiesta","address":"987 Beach Road, Beachside","location":{"city":"Los Angeles","country":"USA"},"food_types":["Mexican","Latin American"],"pricy_score":3},{"name":"The Golden Dragon","address":"147 Temple Street, Chinatown","location":{"city":"San Francisco","country":"USA"},"food_types":["Chinese","Asian","Dim Sum"],"pricy_score":6},{"name":"Mediterranean Breeze","address":"258 Harbor Drive, Waterfront","location":{"city":"Barcelona","country":"Spain"},"food_types":["Mediterranean","Greek","Seafood"],"pricy_score":7},{"name":"The Steakhouse","address":"369 Executive Plaza, Business District","location":{"city":"New York","country":"USA"},"food_types":["Steakhouse","American","Fine Dining"],"pricy_score":9},{"name":"Café Delights","address":"741 College Avenue, University District","location":{"city":"Boston","country":"USA"},"food_types":["Café","Breakfast","Bakery"],"pricy_score":3}]
I'll create a comprehensive restaurant browsing UI with search and filter capabilities.

function.name: A2ui_payload
function.arguments: {"surfaceUpdate": {"surfaceId":"restaurant-finder","components":[{"id":"root","component":{"Column":{"children":{"explicitList":["header","search-section","filter-section","results-section"]},"distribution":"start","alignment":"stretch"}}},{"id":"header","component":{"Column":{"children":{"explicitList":["title","subtitle"]},"alignment":"center","distribution":"start"}}},{"id":"title","component":{"Text":{"text":{"literalString":"Restaurant Finder"},"usageHint":"h1"}}},{"id":"subtitle","component":{"Text":{"text":{"literalString":"Discover amazing dining experiences around the world"},"usageHint":"body"}}},{"id":"search-section","component":{"Card":{"child":"search-content"}}},{"id":"search-content","component":{"Column":{"children":{"explicitList":["search-field","location-field"]},"distribution":"start","alignment":"stretch"}}},{"id":"search-field","component":{"TextField":{"label":{"literalString":"Search restaurants..."},"text":{"path":"/filters/searchText"},"textFieldType":"shortText"}}},{"id":"location-field","component":{"TextField":{"label":{"literalString":"City or Country"},"text":{"path":"/filters/location"},"textFieldType":"shortText"}}},{"id":"filter-section","component":{"Card":{"child":"filter-content"}}},{"id":"filter-content","component":{"Column":{"children":{"explicitList":["filter-title","price-filter-row","cuisine-filter"]},"distribution":"start","alignment":"stretch"}}},{"id":"filter-title","component":{"Text":{"text":{"literalString":"Filters"},"usageHint":"h3"}}},{"id":"price-filter-row","component":{"Column":{"children":{"explicitList":["price-label","price-slider","price-range-text"]},"distribution":"start","alignment":"stretch"}}},{"id":"price-label","component":{"Text":{"text":{"literalString":"Price Range (1-10)"},"usageHint":"body"}}},{"id":"price-slider","component":{"Slider":{"value":{"path":"/filters/maxPrice"},"minValue":1,"maxValue":10}}},{"id":"price-range-text","component":{"Text":{"text":{"path":"/filters/priceDisplay"},"usageHint":"caption"}}},{"id":"cuisine-filter","component":{"Column":{"children":{"explicitList":["cuisine-label","cuisine-checkboxes"]},"distribution":"start","alignment":"stretch"}}},{"id":"cuisine-label","component":{"Text":{"text":{"literalString":"Cuisine Types"},"usageHint":"body"}}},{"id":"cuisine-checkboxes","component":{"Column":{"children":{"template":{"dataBinding":"/availableCuisines","componentId":"cuisine-checkbox-item"}},"distribution":"start","alignment":"stretch"}}},{"id":"cuisine-checkbox-item","component":{"CheckBox":{"label":{"path":"/name"},"value":{"path":"/selected"}}}},{"id":"results-section","component":{"Column":{"children":{"explicitList":["results-header","results-list"]},"distribution":"start","alignment":"stretch"}}},{"id":"results-header","component":{"Text":{"text":{"path":"/resultsCount"},"usageHint":"h3"}}},{"id":"results-list","component":{"List":{"children":{"template":{"dataBinding":"/filteredRestaurants","componentId":"restaurant-card"}},"direction":"vertical","alignment":"stretch"}}},{"id":"restaurant-card","component":{"Card":{"child":"restaurant-card-content"}}},{"id":"restaurant-card-content","component":{"Column":{"children":{"explicitList":["restaurant-header","restaurant-info-grid","restaurant-location","cuisine-tags","restaurant-footer"]},"distribution":"start","alignment":"stretch"}}},{"id":"restaurant-header","component":{"Row":{"children":{"explicitList":["restaurant-name","price-badge"]},"distribution":"spaceBetween","alignment":"center"}}},{"id":"restaurant-name","component":{"Text":{"text":{"path":"/name"},"usageHint":"h4"}}},{"id":"price-badge","component":{"Card":{"child":"price-text"}}},{"id":"price-text","component":{"Text":{"text":{"path":"/priceDisplay"},"usageHint":"caption"}}},{"id":"restaurant-info-grid","component":{"Column":{"children":{"explicitList":["address-row"]},"distribution":"start","alignment":"stretch"}}},{"id":"address-row","component":{"Row":{"children":{"explicitList":["location-icon","address-text"]},"distribution":"start","alignment":"center"}}},{"id":"location-icon","component":{"Icon":{"name":{"literalString":"locationOn"}}}},{"id":"address-text","component":{"Text":{"text":{"path":"/address"},"usageHint":"body"}}},{"id":"restaurant-location","component":{"Text":{"text":{"path":"/locationDisplay"},"usageHint":"caption"}}},{"id":"cuisine-tags","component":{"Row":{"children":{"template":{"dataBinding":"/food_types","componentId":"cuisine-tag"}},"distribution":"start","alignment":"center"}}},{"id":"cuisine-tag","component":{"Card":{"child":"cuisine-tag-text"}}},{"id":"cuisine-tag-text","component":{"Text":{"text":{"path":"/"},"usageHint":"caption"}}},{"id":"restaurant-footer","component":{"Row":{"children":{"explicitList":["view-btn"]},"distribution":"end"}}},{"id":"view-btn","component":{"Button":{"child":"view-btn-text","action":{"name":"view_restaurant","context":[{"key":"restaurantName","value":{"path":"/name"}}]},"primary":true}}},{"id":"view-btn-text","component":{"Text":{"text":{"literalString":"View Details"}}}}]}}
